npc_output: I'd be happy to help, let's pour the festive feast
I'm tracking the rugged arrow, want to come
I can build the polished plank, let's get started
I'm mixing the secretive curse, don't interrupt
I need help with the humble cleaning, thanks for offering
The ripe seed needs watering, want to help
A strange charm, predict the strange broom after storm
Break the hidden gem before sunset, careful in there
Hope the dirty companion after rain, I can share
